name: The battle of the canyon
description:
This is a first person shooting game. The player plays a soldier, exploring the enemy's position in the canyon and collecting as much weapons and equipment as possible because there are too many enemies.

The enemy gathers in a certain place outside the canyon, players can freely explore the surrounding area, players can avoid the enemy's attack, or kill the enemy to survive as much as possible.



Control key:



Right click the target



WASD movement



Left shift operation



Left mouse button attack



Space jump



Left Ctrl squat



Mouse control direction



Loading weapons



F pick up the weapon



Middle mouse button to switch weapons
